哀.definition: (bound form) sorrow; grief; pity; (bound form) to grieve for; to pity; to lament; to condole

哀傷.definition: grief; distress; bereavement; grieved; heartbroken; dejected

哀兵必勝.definition: an army burning with righteous indignation is bound to win (idiom)

哀勸.definition: to persuade by all possible means; to implore

哀告賓服.definition: to bring tribute as sign of submission (idiom); to submit

哀嘆.definition: to sigh; to lament; to bewail

哀嚎.definition: to howl in grief; anguished wailing; same as 哀號|哀号[ai1 hao2]

哀婉.definition: (esp. of poetry, music) melancholy; sad and moving

哀家.definition: I, me (self-referring by a widowed empress etc, used in historical novels and operas)

哀平.definition: joint name for the Han dynasty emperors Aidi (reigned 7-1 BC) and Pingdi (reigned 1 BC - 6 AD)

哀悼.definition: to grieve over sb's death; to lament sb's death; mourning

哀憐.definition: to feel compassion for; to pity

哀憫.definition: to take pity on; to feel sorry for

哀榮.definition: (literary) reverence accorded to sb who has died; posthumous recognition

哀毀瘠立.definition: see 哀毀骨立|哀毁骨立[ai1hui3-gu3li4]

哀毀骨立.definition: (idiom) (literary) to become emaciated due to grief (usu. due to the death of a parent)

哀求.definition: to entreat; to implore; to plead

哀江南賦.definition: Lament for the South, long poem in Fu style by Yu Xin 庾信 mourning the passing of Liang of the Southern dynasties 南朝梁朝

哀痛.definition: to grieve; to mourn; deep sorrow; grief

哀矜.definition: to take pity on; to feel sorry for

哀莫大於心死.pinyin: ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3
哀莫大於心死.definition: nothing sadder than a withered heart (idiom attributed to Confucius by Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); no greater sorrow than a heart that never rejoices; the worst sorrow is not as bad as an uncaring heart; nothing is more wretched than apathy

哀號.definition: to cry piteously; anguished wailing; same as 哀嚎[ai1 hao2]

哀詞.definition: variant of 哀辭|哀辞[ai1 ci2]

哀豔.definition: (of poetry etc) plaintive and beautiful; poignant

哀鳴.definition: (of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound; whine; moan; wail

哀鴻遍野.definition: lit. plaintive whine of geese (idiom); fig. land swarming with disaster victims; starving people fill the land
